summary: A unit of female Israeli soldiers at a remote desert base bide their time as they count down the minutes until they can return to civilian life.
cast: Dana Ivgy|Nelly Tagar|Shani Klein|Heli Twito|Meytal Gal|Tamara Klingon|Yonit Tobi|Yuval Segal|Elad Smama|Moshe Ashkenazi|Dana Meinrath|Lior Weinberg|Adi Havshush|Lee Lotan|Eyal Heyne Galli|Shir Klipper|Maya Goldenstein|Adar Hazan|Livnat Kabesa|Moran Rosen|Gal Ben Amra|Jonathan Dekel
title: Efes beyahasei enosh
